name: oxZombie - werewolf team
description: A zombie​ apocalypse has come. Now Homo sapiens is an endangered species. Who wants to be on the side of extinct?! Nobody of course. You're a zombie. But not the one who drools and walk from corner to corner. You're a zombie-commander. This pitiful mankind makes last efforts trying to spoil your life. They invent "cure", attack on your brothers. It is time to put an end to this. Send your mindless, hulking soldiers so no man had time to reach his goal. Make ambushes, chase vermins, surround them. Do everything you can so they don't pass! Explore zombie life.
